languages.text: "Я?.. Я ничего такого..." {n}Мужчина вздрагивает от неожиданности и чуть не сваливается вниз, но вовремя восстанавливает равновесие. Под блеклым светом {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменов{/g} вы замечаете россыпь застарелых шрамов на его теле. Они кажутся смутно знакомыми.{/n}

"What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я?.. Я ничего такого..." {n}Мужчина вздрагивает от неожиданности и чуть не сваливается вниз, но вовремя восстанавливает равновесие. Под блеклым светом {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменов{/g} вы замечаете россыпь застарелых шрамов на его теле. Они кажутся смутно знакомыми.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls down, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim light of lumens, you notice a scattering of old scars all over his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

"What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

languages.text: « Comment ? Je... je n'ai pas... » {n}L'homme trébuche et manque de tomber, mais se rétablit in extremis. Malgré la pénombre, vous remarquez que son corps est couvert de vieilles cicatrices dont la forme vous est étrangement familière.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}{/g}
languages.original_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? Je... je n'ai pas... » {n}L'homme trébuche et manque de tomber, mais se rétablit in extremis. Malgré la pénombre, vous remarquez que son corps est couvert de vieilles cicatrices dont la forme vous est étrangement familière.{/n}

« Comment ? Je... je n'ai pas... » {n}L'homme trébuche et manque de tomber, mais se rétablit in extremis. Malgré la pénombre, vous remarquez que son corps est couvert de vieilles cicatrices dont la forme vous est étrangement familière.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué? No... yo no...». {n}El hombre da un respingo y casi se cae, pero logra mantener el equilibrio. Bajo la tenue luz de {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} adviertes que tiene el cuerpo surcado de cicatrices con patrones que te resultan vagamente familiares.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? No... yo no...». {n}El hombre da un respingo y casi se cae, pero logra mantener el equilibrio. Bajo la tenue luz de lumen adviertes que tiene el cuerpo surcado de cicatrices con patrones que te resultan vagamente familiares.{/n}

languages.text: 「え？ちが…私は…」{n}男は立ち上がり、転びそうになったがなんとかバランスを保つ。薄暗い {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}照明{/g}の中で、男の体のあちこちに見える古い傷跡に気づく。どことなく見覚えのある傷跡だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「え？ちが…私は…」{n}男は立ち上がり、転びそうになったがなんとかバランスを保つ。薄暗い照明の中で、男の体のあちこちに見える古い傷跡に気づく。どことなく見覚えのある傷跡だ。{/n}

languages.text: “什么？我……我可没有……”{n}这个人被你吓了一跳，差点摔了下去，但还是保持住了平衡。在昏暗的{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}灯光{/g}下，你看到他身上到处都是旧伤疤，这些伤疤莫名地有些眼熟。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “什么？我……我可没有……”{n}这个人被你吓了一跳，差点摔了下去，但还是保持住了平衡。在昏暗的灯光下，你看到他身上到处都是旧伤疤，这些伤疤莫名地有些眼熟。{/n}
“什么？我……我可没有……”{n}这个人被你吓了一跳，差点摔了下去，但还是保持住了平衡。在昏暗的灯光下，你看到他身上到处都是旧伤疤，这些伤疤莫名地有些眼熟。{/n}

languages.text: "Was? Ich ... Nein, ich ..." {n}Der Mann fährt hoch und stürzt beinahe, kann aber das Gleichgewicht halten. Im Dämmerlicht der {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumen{/g} bemerkst du überall auf seinem Körper alte Narben. Sie kommen dir irgendwie bekannt vor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was? Ich ... Nein, ich ..." {n}Der Mann fährt hoch und stürzt beinahe, kann aber das Gleichgewicht halten. Im Dämmerlicht der Lumen bemerkst du überall auf seinem Körper alte Narben. Sie kommen dir irgendwie bekannt vor.{/n}

"Was? Ich ... Nein, ich ..." {n}Der Mann fährt hoch und stürzt beinahe, kann aber das Gleichgewicht halten. Im Dämmerlicht der Lumen bemerkst du überall auf seinem Körper alte Narben. Sie kommen dir irgendwie bekannt vor.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne? Ben... Hayır..." {n}Adam düşeyazıp dengesini sağlamayı başarıyor. Loş {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lümen{/g} ışığında vücudunun her bir yanına sirayet etmiş eski yara izlerini görüyorsun. İzlere bir yerden tanıdık geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? I... I didn't..." {n}The man starts and almost falls, but manages to keep his balance. In the dim {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} light, you notice old scars scattered all across his body. The scars seem vaguely familiar.{/n}
